name: Rolex Watch
description: Rolex is a Swiss luxury watch manufacturer and brand, renowned for its high-quality, precision timepieces. Founded in 1905 by Hans Wilsdorf and Alfred Davis, the company initially operated under the name Wilsdorf and Davis before registering the Rolex brand name in 1908
